scenario_text.value:
I figured Aoi might’ve come back by now, so
I looked around the school, but...
Guess it’s not gonna be that easy.
Yeah, I guess not.
Aw, come on, Kaito! Don’t look so down!

What? You expect me to grin like an idiot
while Aoi’s lost out there?

(Really, his expression does seem grim. He
looks like he did when Miu was missing.)

You’re seriously worried about Aoi, aren’t
you, Kaito?
Well of course I am! We all are!
I mean, yeah, that’s true, but...

But you’ve been dwelling on it too much!
She’s all you’ve been thinking about!

You didn’t sleep at all last night, and if
you keep this up, you’re gonna burn out!

Hey, didn’t I tell you to keep quiet about
that?

(Wow, I had no idea Kaito was so concerned
about Aoi.)
(Why would he be this worked up about her?)

(Obviously she’s a friend, I get that, but
Kaito’s top priority has always been Miu.)

(Is there something more going on here? Of
course, he’ll probably get upset if I ask.)

(And it’s true that we’re all worried about
Aoi. Should I press him on it anyway?)
(Do I ask why Kaito’s so worried?)
Ask.
Don’t ask.
Ask.

You know, now I’m curious. What’s got you so
concerned about Aoi that you’re losing sleep?
Is there some...special reason?

Takuma, are you givin’ me a hard time on this
too? Now, when we should be out searching?
Hey, don’t try to dodge the question.

You’ve always put Miu before anything else,
but now you seem more worried about Aoi.

I was just wondering if there was some
special reason for that.

Not really. At least, it’s not the kind of
“special reason” you two have in mind.

It’s just...she’s done so much to look out
for us since we came to this world.

Plus, I get how she must be feeling, blaming
herself for what happened with Saki.

And it just bothers me, okay! That’s all
there is to it!
Don’t ask.

Uh, well, whatever the reason, I can see why
you’d be worried about a friend. Yeah.

Takuma... That’s the worst poker face I’ve
ever seen.

You couldn’t look more curious if you tried.
So come on, out with it already.
Urk...

All right, I’ll ask. Kaito, what’s got you so
concerned about Aoi?

It’s not like I’ve got some special reason or
anything.

It’s just...I feel like I owe her for all
she’s done for us since we came here.

After all that, I’d hate to just abandon her
out there.

Anyway, the important thing is we gotta find
her before anything happens to her.

She’s got Labramon with her. I’m sure she’s
fine.
Yeah, that’s what I think too!

I guess. You never know about that fog,
though, so we can’t just sit around.

We’re going to go look by the shrine. Takuma,
you and Agumon keep an eye out too!
We will!
Stay safe, you two!

Aoi helped us out so much... We gotta find
her so we can all go back together!

We’re going to go look by the shrine. Takuma,
you and Agumon keep an eye out too!
